name: Payroll
description: This is what a game would be like if it was a 20-minute office simulator in Windows 95.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or better Processor: Pentium 4 with 3 GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9-compatible video card and a 1024x768px resolution monitor or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Windows-compatible Additional Notes: Keyboard+mouse or gamepad
